sentence: Reps. Ronny Jackson (R., Texas), Mr. Trumps former White House doctor, and Lauren Boebert (R., Colo.) received donations, as did Senate candidates Rep. Mo Brooks (R., Ala.) and Herschel Walker, among others.
author: Chad Day
title: Trump Reports $122 Million Political War Chest as He Weighs 2024 Bid

sentence: Trump is also backing former NFL star Herschel Walker in the race against Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock in Georgia, where many Republicans blamed the former president for costing the party both its Senate seats in a January 2021 runoff by stoking debunked conspiracy theories about election fraud.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Republicans in chaos: Conflict with Trump endangers GOP Senate prospects

sentence: The Republican frontrunner, Herschel Walker, took in more than $5 million, outpacing his other Republican primary opponents, but at the same time that Warnock took in roughly $13 million.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Majority of Democrat Sen. Raphael Warnocks Campaign Donations Are from Out of State

sentence: Warnock is likely to face former NFL running back Herschel Walker (R) in the fall.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Republicans reserve $53M in TV ads in bid to win Senate

sentence: It appears Republicans plan to spend the most, $9.5 million, on Warnock, who could face Republican Herschel Walker (R) in the general election.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: NRSC to Drop $53 Million in TV Ads to Retake Senate Majority

sentence: Less than two months ago, State Agricultural Commissioner Gary Black was trailing former football star Herschel Walker in the Republican Senate primary when he told a rally in Putnam County that he didn't think there was any chance Walker could beat incumbent Democrat Raphael Warnock in the fall.
author: Bill Powell
title: Why Did It Take the GOP So Long to Panic About Herschel Walker?
